title: Motivational Teaching Method Design to Strengthen Adolescent Developmental Needs and Academic Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of adolescent developmental theories and awareness of motivational concepts
context.additional_context: Strategy design linking adolescent development theories with academic motivation for science education contexts, targeting university students in medical/legal/technical professions

learning_goals: Explain factors influencing academic motivation changes according to adolescent developmental stages (cognitive, emotional, social)
Apply the four key elements of motivational teaching methods (time utilization, challenging tasks, collaborative learning, resource utilization) to actual instructional design
One can conduct a case analysis of how teachers' empathic responses and respect-based control influence the enhancement of learner motivation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
